name: cspace-client
description: CollectionSpace client for browsers and Node.js
author: Ray Lee <ray.lee@lyrasis.org>

scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-umd
scripts.build-umd: npm run build-umd-dev && npm run build-umd-prod
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run coverage
scripts.coverage: istanbul report --root coverage text && istanbul report --root coverage lcov
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.test-specs: npm run test-node-specs && npm run test-browser-specs
scripts.test-integration: npm run test-node-integration && npm run test-browser-integration
scripts.test-browser: npm run test-browser-specs && npm run test-browser-integration
scripts.test-node: npm run test-node-specs && npm run test-node-integration
scripts.test-node-specs: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --report-dir coverage/test-node-specs mocha --require @babel/register --require test/stubs/cspaceServer --recursive --exit test/specs
scripts.test-node-integration: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --report-dir coverage/test-node-integration mocha --require @babel/register --file test/helpers/nodeTestSetup.js --recursive --exit test/integration
